Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: My 12 year old just got into photography class and really took to it, so this was a Christmas Present.  It's not a full SLR, but it has a great zoom and most of the features you would find in a full on Rebel or others.  Great mega-pixel resolution and the perfect size for a young photographer to easily manipulate.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 effective megapixel, 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor
3-inch TFT color LCD with wide viewing angle
DIGIC 4 image processor
720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button
24mm wide-angle lens with powerful 30x optical zoom and optical image stabilizer
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera in Black + 32GB Memory Card + Classic Camera Bag + Accessory Kit
